slideInfo.qText:
1799–1801: Second Coalition
1805–1807: Third Coalition
1807: Continental System
1808–1814: Peninsular War
1812: Invasion of Russia
1814: Napoleon abdicates
1815: Final defeat at Waterloo
slideInfo.correctText: For my second trip, I spent a third of my time on the continent, visiting the peninsula and Russia before abdicating at Waterloo.
